title: Warning alerts v2: Generate and send Slack summary digests for managers

sections.text: Implement Slack digest messages that summarize Warning alerts v2 for each routed manager, grouping alerts by account/opportunity and de-duping repeated triggers within the digest window. Include key context (alert type, risk signal, last updated time) and deep links back to the relevant account/opportunity in Sales_Accelerator/CRM. This ticket covers digest generation and Slack formatting only; it assumes recipient routing is handled by GOLD-92.
